channel.title: Sorry for this
channel.description:
I'm sorry for posting this, I know taht most of these answers are in these threads... but I dont have much time -.-. Question1: How can I play on the same server as my buddy Question2: Why is this game so buggy? And, is it just me? Question3: Why does dragon 2h make me crash Question4: Where are most of these monsters?
If these can be answerd i would be thankful :)

item.title: Sorry for this
item.dc:creator: @MoparRocksScape MoparRocksScape
item.description:
@MoparRocksScape wrote:

Question1:
Use my guide to connect to one: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,126997.0.html
Question2:
There are probably some bugs if your playing alone, but if you are on a server then there will be less bugs and less crashing (hopefully).
Question3:
It might be just frequent crashes if you play alone or it is the server you are playing.
Question4:
If you are playing alone, they will be set up just like normal RuneScape, but if you are playing a server then they will be changed around such as a Jad in Varrock!

~Mike

Read full topic

item.title: Sorry for this
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

Answer 1:
Download a server source and connect through your IP.
Answer 2:
Nothing is perfect, but you may code to your own perfection.
Answer 3:
Experiment with other sources.
Answer 4:
Spawn them through the Autospawn.cfg

Read full topic
